meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of anarchy.
meanings.sent1: The anarchic group caused chaos in the city.
meanings.sent2: The protest turned anarchic as people started breaking windows.
meanings.sent3: The classroom felt anarchic when the teacher stepped out for a minute.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an anarchic whirlwind, impossible to contain.
meanings.sent5: The garden was an anarchic explosion of colors and scents.

meanings.sent1: The anarchic traffic made it impossible to cross the street.
meanings.sent2: The party became anarchic after the music got louder.
meanings.sent3: His desk looked anarchic with papers scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The storm left an anarchic trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The children's play area was an anarchic mess of toys and games.
